description.en:
"Kyosuke Toyo is tired of masturbating. As the son of a sex toy manufacturer, he’s tried pretty much everything…that is until his father sends him the latest prototype. Introducing the Neo Love Doll T-00 “Apple”!!! This sex doll is so realistic it can think and act on its own. All this “Apple” wants to do is get in Kyosuke’s pants! But when the girl next door comes knocking, you know things are going to get complicated. In the battle for Kyosuke’s love, will silicone and sex win out? Also included in this volume is The Dirty Triangle, a teenage tale of unrequited love and the lengths we’ll go through to be with that special someone even if it means you’re the third wheel.

Kazuma Takeuchi explores the boundaries of human desire and the ways we satisfy those desires. Take in the gorgeous curves and reveal in the glory of the female form. Bountiful bosoms abound in this raunchy romance!" (Project H.)

0.5 Prototype Apple 2.5
1-6. Prototype Apple
7-9.5. The Dirty Triangle
10. Angelic Reaper Izayoi

**TAGS**
**MALE** schoolboy uniform
**FEMALE** apron, big breasts, corset, defloration, futanari, kimono, lactation, robot, schoolgirl uniform, shimapan, stockings, twintails
**MIXED** ffm threesome, group
**OTHER** tankoubon
description.ja: 男を取り合う美少女たち…クーデレアンドロド『アップル』と優しくて憧れのお姉さん『林檎』…。レズだと思ってたら初SEXで目覚めてしまった『茉莉花』とこちらも初SEXでチ○ポに夢中になってしまった『そは葉』…。三角H関係にトコトンこだわった『とらいあんぐるH』『PA』他を書き下ろし＆加筆で完全収録！三角関係SEXバトルを見逃すなッ!!
